blogPost.excerpt: 🍞 Jam is an open source implementation of audio spaces (think: Clubhouse, Twitter Spaces, Orbit, …). Jam lets you can create rooms that can be used for panel discussions, jam sessions, free flowing conversations, debates, theatre plays, musicals and more.
blogPost.body: 🍞 Jam is an open source implementation of audio spaces (think: Clubhouse, Twitter Spaces, Orbit, …). Jam lets you can create rooms that can be used for panel discussions, jam sessions, free flowing conversations, debates, theatre plays, musicals and more.
blogPost.title: Jam - Your own version of Clubhouse for mini conferences & friends
blogPost.author: Thomas Schranz ⛄️

localize.description: 🍞 Jam是一个开源的音频空间实现（想想看：Clubhouse，Twitter Spaces，Orbit，...）。Jam让你可以创建可用于小组讨论、果酱会议、自由流动的对话、辩论、戏剧、音乐剧等的房间。
localize.tagline: 您自己的小型会议和朋友聚会的会所版本。

localize.description: 🍞 Jam是一個開源的音頻空間實現（想想看：Clubhouse，Twitter Spaces，Orbit，...）。Jam讓你可以創建可用於小組討論、果醬會議、自由流動的對話、辯論、戲劇、音樂劇等的房間。
localize.tagline: 您自己的小型會議和朋友聚會的會所版本。

previous.excerpt: Troposphere provides easy to use global weather, climate and location search APIs. Get started for free with the first 1,000 api calls per month for free.
previous.title: Troposphere - Global weather and climate data API for your projects

localize.description: Troposphere提供简单易用的全球天气、气候和位置搜索API。每月前1000次api免费调用，即可免费使用。
localize.tagline: 为您的项目提供全球天气和气候数据API

localize.description: Troposphere提供簡單易用的全球天氣、氣候和位置搜索API。每月前1000次api免費調用，即可免費使用。
localize.tagline: 爲您的項目提供全球天氣和氣候數據API

next.excerpt: Looking at a pile of domain renewals again? Bye Bye Domain is a marketplace to find a buyer for your domains before they expire. We list quality domains for low prices.
next.title: Bye Bye Domain - Buy and sell domains before they expire

localize.description: 又在看一堆域名续费？Bye Bye Domain是一个市场，可以在你的域名到期前为你的域名找到买家。我们以低价列出优质域名。
localize.tagline: 在过期前购买和出售域名

localize.description: 又在看一堆域名續費？Bye Bye Domain是一個市場，可以在你的域名到期前爲你的域名找到買家。我們以低價列出優質域名。
localize.tagline: 在過期前購買和出售域名
